00009     const double M_PI_180 = M_PI / 180.0;
00010     const double M_180_PI = 180.0 / M_PI;
00011 
00017     template <typename T>
00018     T normalizeAngleRad2Pi(T angle) {
00019         while (angle > 2.0*M_PI) {
00020             angle -= 2.0*M_PI;
00021         }
00022         while (angle < 0.0) {
00023             angle += 2.0*M_PI;
00024         }
00025         return angle;
00026     }
00027 
00033     template <typename T>
00034     T normalizeAngleRad(T angle) {
00035         while(angle > M_PI) {
00036             angle -= 2.0*M_PI;
00037         }
00038         while(angle < -M_PI) {
00039             angle += 2.0*M_PI;
00040         }
00041         return angle;
00042     }
00043 
00051     template <typename T>
00052     T wraparoundDistance(T a, T b) {
00053         T min = std::min(a,b);
00054         T max = std::max(a,b);
00055 
00056         T dist1 = max - min;
00057         T dist2 = normalizeAngleRad(min-max);
00058 
00059         return std::min(dist1, dist2);
00060     }
00061 
00069     template <typename T>
00070     T wraparoundDistance2Pi(T a, T b) {
00071         T min = std::min(a,b);
00072         T max = std::max(a,b);
00073 
00074         T dist1 = max - min;
00075         T dist2 = normalizeAngleRad2Pi(min-max);
00076 
00077         return std::min(dist1, dist2);
00078     }

00085     template<typename T>
00086     T deg2rad(T degrees) {
00087         return degrees * static_cast<T>(M_PI_180);
00088     }
00089 
00095     template<typename T>
00096     T rad2deg(T radians) {
00097         return radians * static_cast<T>(M_180_PI);
00098     }
00099 
00107     template<typename T>
00108     bool almostEqual(T a, T b, T epsilon)
00109     {
00110         return abs(a-b) < epsilon;
00111     }
00112 
00113     bool
00114     almostEqual(float a, float b, float epsilon = 0.0000001f)
00115     {
00116         return almostEqual<float>(a,b,epsilon);
00117     }
